verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Noel, Noel, Noel, Noel, newline Born is the King of Israel.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The first Noel, newline The angel did say, newline Was to certain poor shepherds, newline In fields as they lay; newline In fields where they newline Lay keeping their sheep, newline On a cold winter's night newline That was so deep.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: They looked up and saw a star newline Shining in the east, newline Beyond them far, newline And to the earth newline It gave great light, newline And so it continued newline Both day and night.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: And by the light newline Of that same star, newline Three wise men came newline From country far; newline To seek for a King newline Was their intent, newline And to follow the star, newline Wherever it went.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: This star drew nigh newline To the northwest, newline O'er Bethlehem newline It took its rest, newline And there it did newline Both stop and stay, newline Right over the place newline Where Jesus lay.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Then entered in newline Those wise men three, newline Full rev'rently newline Upon their knee, newline And offered there newline In His presence, newline Their gold, and myrrh, newline And frankincense.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Then let us all newline With one accord, newline Sing praises to newline Our heavenly Lord, newline That hath made heav'n newline And earth of naught, newline And with His blood newline Mankind hath bought.
